summary: Diff implements a reusable QuantitySelector component, wires quantity selection into ProductCard (used on ProductsPage and HomePage) and ProductDetailPage, updates cartStore.addItem to accept an explicit quantity and accumulate quantities for existing items, and adds a HomePage “Hot Products” section derived from the existing products query. One acceptance criterion (removal of the old “Why Choose Us” grid) cannot be fully verified due to truncation of HomePage.tsx in the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: HomePage no longer renders the “Why Choose Us” feature grid.
missing_requirements.reason: HomePage.tsx is truncated in the diff summary; while a “Hot Products” section is shown, the evidence does not conclusively show the old “Why Choose Us” section was removed.
